question: What is the criteria for becoming an Assister (Navigator)?
text:
What is the criteria for becoming an Assister (Navigator)?
          
        
The criteria for becoming a registered Pennsylvania Assister are updated and 
available to prospective applicants
. Unlike some other states, PA requires all Navigators and Assisters to register with the Pennsylvania Insurance Department. Pennie Assister training is updated and can be requested by emailing 
assisters@pennie.com
. Please note that former CDO/CACs are encouraged 
to apply for PA Assister registration
 through the Pennsylvania Department of Insurance.
